comment: Bought a bottle from Total Wine in Massachusetts from 2019. I’ve always been a huge fan of the normal double rye, it is what opened my eyes to the rye world and I still consider it one of the best bangs for your buck. This has a little less on the nose but packs considerably more flavor on the palate than the traditional.
Limited release,  pinot noirs barrel. 10 months, Woodman's, barrel # 7973.  Very nice flavor, smooth, interesting finish vs. Retail.
